Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Bud Abbott and Lou Costello are members of the National Baseball Hall of Fame.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Bud Abbott and Lou Costello are the only people with no professional connection to the sport to be honored with induction into the National Baseball Hall of Fame, which is a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided that suggests that Bud Abbott and Lou Costello were inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame as a surprise during The Steve Allen Show, but this explanation is not confirmed.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that as of 2019, the Hall of Fame has enshrined 323 members, but there is no mention of Bud Abbott and Lou Costello being among them.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the association between Abbott and Costello and baseball, suggesting that they have a professional connection to the sport and have been honored with induction into the Hall of Fame.
Understate: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim understates any information.
